description: Homes with 2 and 3 bedrooms with a terrace, ground floor apartments with a garden and penthouses under a cooperative system in Pau de Valdehondillo Humanes in Madrid. Land owned. Urbanization with swimming pool, recreation areas and gourmet multipurpose room. The houses have underfloor heating-cooling, PVC windows with thermal break and one or two parking spaces. Located less than 30 minutes from the center of Madrid, with access by car from the A-42, with direct public transport both by train (C-5, 25 minutes to Atocha) and by bus. Next to the Parque Sur Shopping Center and others nearby such as Loranca, Xanadú and Nassica, and with all kinds of services at your fingertips: schools, medical centers, leisure, shops and supermarkets.

Second floor exterior property extending to approx. 93 sq. m, built in 1978, with no elevator. Comprising a hallway, a living-dining room, three bedrooms, a bathroom and a kitchen with a terrace. Apartment to refurbish. Subject property is located in the municipality of Humanes, 26 km from Madrid. Close to the Renfe-Cercanías train station in Humanes. Local amenities include parks, pharmacies, supermarkets, shops, schools and health centers. It is very close to the Universidad Rey Juan Carlos, the Hospital Universitario de Fuenlabrada and Fabrik nightclub. Local amenities include Humanes health centre, a Mercadona supermarket, the Santo Domingo de Guzmán Public School, the Humanes Veterinary Clinic, several bars and restaurants, the pharmacy and the La Pecera Paddle Tennis Club. It is easily accessible from the M-405, M-407 and M-410 roads and by train (C5) with the station just a few metres away. GILMER SELLS, Spacious and bright 3-bedroom apartment on the 5th floor of a building with an elevator. This home has a full bathroom and a closed terrace, ideal for enjoying moments of relaxation. This beautiful apartment in Humanes de Madrid has an area of 80 square meters, distributed in a double room and two single rooms, a full bathroom and an equipped kitchen. The property has been completely renovated, with modern finishes such as wooden floors, white lacquered interior carpentry and exterior PVC windows. Semi-detached single-family home consisting of three floors above ground, consisting of four bedrooms and two bathrooms, with a constructed area of 254.2 m2 and a useful living area of 250 m2. It is located in the municipality of Humanes, in the province of Madrid. The house is made up of three floors. The ground floor has an open space for the garage and storage room. The first floor consists of a hall, porch area at the entrance, living room with fireplace, kitchen, a bathroom. The second floor has four bedrooms and access to a large side outdoor terrace. The house has a fireplace, garden, garage, herringbone parquet floors in the main rooms, with ceramic stoneware in the kitchen and bathrooms, aluminum windows and interior wood carpentry, mainly sapele. All in good condition. The property is located in a quiet area, surrounded by residential homes with similar characteristics. In addition, it is located a short distance from the center of the town, where it is possible to find all kinds of services, such as restaurants, schools, health centers, shops. The house has an excellent location and is very well connected by the regional roads that surround the municipality and by public transport.

IDEHOGAR offers you a beautiful duplex with a garden in the heart of Humanes. 158 m2 built. Beautiful house divided into 2 floors with more than 100 m2 of garden for private use. In gated community. Divided into a ground floor with a bright and spacious living room of more than 30 m2 with access to a beautiful garden, with a 25 m2 porch plus 90 m2 land for what you want with a pool, barbecue, tool shed and green area. Kitchen furnished with appliances, in perfect condition. In the lower part toilet. In the staircase, a built-in wardrobe with a large capacity that takes advantage of the entire space under the stairs. In the upper part it is divided into a suite bedroom with lots of light, a large built-in wardrobe, a complete bathroom with a hydromassage bathtub. Two bedrooms of more than 15 m2 each with a built-in wardrobe overlooking the garden. All very bright and spacious. All the carpentry of the house is in oak color, flooring. White aluminum carpentry with Climalit thermal cut or similar. Pre-installation of air conditioning throughout the house. Smooth paint. Independent heating by natural gas. Boiler in good condition. Exterior parking space at the same entrance door. Located in the center of Humanes, 5 minutes walk from the Renfe station, less than 100 meters from bus stops, schools, shopping areas. Close to any of the Humanes Health or Educational Centers in Madrid. We have a financial department at your disposal that can help you with the pertinent procedures of your mortgage, we collaborate with financial teams that provide 100% of the mortgage according to profiles without the need to decapitalize you, with very good conditions. Do not hesitate, contact me, your real estate agent BERTA GARCIA VERDUGO Phone 650294138.

Possibility of financing up to 100%, free financial study Spacious semi-detached house for sale in the municipality of Humanes, province of Madrid. This semi-detached single-family home is distributed over four floors and has all the amenities you can imagine. On the semi-basement floor, you will find a spacious garage with capacity for several vehicles and a bright open-plan room that you can use according to your needs. On the first floor, you will be welcomed by a hall that will lead you to the cozy living-dining room, perfect for enjoying family moments. In addition, you will have a fully equipped kitchen-dining room and a full bathroom. On the second floor, you will discover four spacious and bright bedrooms, all of them with built-in wardrobes for optimal use of space. In addition, you will have at your disposal two full bathrooms with windows that provide natural light. If you go up to the attic, you will be surprised by its spaciousness and luminosity, in addition to having access to a terrace where you can enjoy unobstructed views. This home has a fireplace that will provide you with warmth on the coldest days, as well as a garden where you can relax and enjoy the outdoors. In addition, you will not have to worry about parking, since it has a garage. The parquet and ceramic stoneware floors, the aluminum windows and the wooden interior carpentry are details that provide quality and comfort to this home. Located in a quiet area surrounded by residential homes, you will be close to the center of the town, where you will find all kinds of services available for your daily life. In addition, you will have good communication by road and public transport, with a RENFE station and bus stops nearby. If you need financing, don't worry, we offer a free financial study to help you throughout the process. And if you are interested in visiting this wonderful home, we will be happy to make an appointment in advance. Do not lose this opportunity! Built area: 254.2 m2 Useful living area: 250 m2 Plot: 191 m2 Year of construction: 2003 Orientation: South, East Parking place Storage room Price: Consult.
